scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/rimraf ./dist && tsc --noImplicitUseStrict && node_modules/.bin/cpy package.json ./dist && node_modules/.bin/cpy --parents db/**/* ./dist
scripts.build-prod: node_modules/.bin/rimraf ./dist && tsc -p ./tsconfig.prod.json && node_modules/.bin/cpy package.json ./dist && node_modules/.bin/cpy --parents db/**/* ./dist
scripts.test: echo 'go to '../test' folder to execute test cases!'
